extendedInfo.description: CLASSIC HORROR FILMS!!!The House of Horrors features over one hundred full length classic horror films from some of the best actors, actresses, and directors over the last hundred years. Nothing more to buy and commercial free!If you like this app, then make sure you check out the full edition of Movie Vault with over one thousand movies at https://market.android.com/details?id=com.flingsoft.movievault.FEATURESâ Stream over 100 classic horror films to your device.â Save movies to your Queue to watch them later!!â True Cover Art and movie information fed directly from IMDB!â Browse movies by custom created genres or Search by Keyword, Actor Name, Title, Director, and more.â Automatic updates of movie listing without app upgrade.SUPPORTFor those of you on the Xoom and other tablets, we are working on allowing fullscreen, stay tuned for an update!!If you have questions or need help, then please visit us at http://www.flingsoft.com/. If you find any technical issues with the movie streams, then please mail us at support@flingsoft.com with the movie in question.NOTE: If you are experiencing an issue where movies will not play, please confirm that you have a decent connection and signal strength before posting a negative review. Most of the time the lack of playback is due to a network connection issue. If you have a solid connection, then please mail us with the movie name so we can help resolve he issue.MOVIE INFORMATIONAll movies contained within the House of Horrors application are Public Domain works as classified under Creative Commons. More information can be found at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain/. If you have any questions or concerns related to the use of a particular film, then please contact us at support@flingsoft.com. We would be happy to help.NOTE ON MOVIE QUALITYMany people have commented on the quality of the movies, so please keep in mind these are not DVD quality films. First, many of these films never found their way to digital, so what you are seeing is actual first cut from film, tape, or other. Next, they are being streamed from the server so we are limited in the quality we can provide. We are doing our best to improve, but many of these films are rare which is why we feel this app is so special.FEEDBACKWe would love to hear your feedback on the app, so please tell us what features you would like to see added. Also, let us know if you have found great movies out in the wild that you think we should add to the collection.Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/flingsoftguys

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: This app plays just fine on my droid razor maxx. Great entertainment for a dollar. You can\'t beat it.
reviews.author: Chris Fields

reviews.title: For \"Splatter Flick\" Fans
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for some of these films for a long time. There are also some I\'d never heard of, that I\'m looking forward to watching.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Works fine (albeit with a few glitches) on a phone, but is almost useless on a tablet, unfortunately. Reasonably priced as convenient UI for some of the genre classics which of course are available for free anyway. All in all still worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs tablet optimization
reviews.comment: This would be great if optimized for tablet viewing. While the screen orientation automatically adjusts to landscape for playing, the menu and movie listing section is only oriented to portrait mode, making it a hassle to flip the tablet back and forth.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awfull
reviews.comment: Films are soo old from 1922!!! Sum don\'t av talking its just music..play well..I just didn\'t think they would b soo old..dissatisfied..disappointed
reviews.author: Dawn Williams

reviews.comment: Thank u so much 4 this app. Truly awesome gems that r hard to get and in their original quality . Pls add some more universal horror. Thnx u rock!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Changed my vote!
reviews.comment: They must have fixed the problems to this app. Now it works perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work for me.
reviews.comment: All I get is a black screen after I pick a movie. I waited a long time and nothing happens. Can I get a refund please?
reviews.author: vonda clemens

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app but some of the films dont work..

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: One of the BEST apps I\'ve ever tried. Works beautifully! Thank you!
